title: Washington Black - another person at the beach

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Edugyan uses literary elements and techniques to convey Wash’s complex response to encountering another person at the beach.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Edugyan uses literary elements and techniques to convey Wash’s complex response to encountering another person at the beach.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
